entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump’s denial that he doesn’t know the Dr. Rick Bright, the person  in charge of working on developing COVID-19 vaccine,if true, is very significant. It means he doesn’t know what’s going on in his administration. HE SHOULD BE REMOVED IMMEDIATELY. Grossly incompetent.
